en: Isn't anyone else able to come?
He wrote down the name so he wouldn't forget it.
zh: 他把名字记下来了，免得忘了。

en: Why don't you calm down? You're really making me cringe.
zh: 你能不能冷静点？你真让我尴尬死了。
汤姆看起来还没拿定主意。

en: Last night, I fell asleep while talking with Mary on the phone.
zh: 昨晚我和玛丽打电话时睡着了。

en: When the parents heard the news, they cheered up.
zh: 父母一听到这个消息，心情就好了起来。

en: As soon as you see this E-mail please reply right away.
zh: 你一看到这封邮件就请马上回复。

en: Please reply as soon as you get this email.
Please reply as soon as you've read this email.
Nagoya is famous for its castle.
It is entirely up to you.
Which is more important, me or Tatoeba?
Who's more important, me or Tatoeba?
I really like a cloudy sky. Why? I don't even know.
zh: 我挺喜欢阴天的。至于为什么？我自己也不知道。

en: A dog runs faster than a human.
I have other cards up my sleeve.
Do you have a favorite singer?
My grandmother on my mother's side lives in Osaka.
My grandfather on my mother's side passed away ten years ago.
My paternal grandmother enjoys tea ceremonies.
I may be crazy, but I'm not stupid.
zh: 我也许疯了，但我并不傻。

en: I bought a scarf for my grandfather on my father's side for his 88th birthday.
zh: 我给爷爷的八十八岁生日买了一条围巾。

en: I'm sorry, but I'm already dating someone.
My grandfather on my father's side is celebrating his 88th birthday tomorrow.
zh: 我爷爷明天过八十八岁大寿。

en: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.
zh: 我外公明天过六十岁生日。

en: Love is nothing more than a temporary hormone imbalance.
zh: 爱情不过是暂时的荷尔蒙失调。

en: The tree's leaves have all fallen.
Do you have a twin sister?
Do you have a twin brother?
A samurai's blood runs in Taro's veins.
zh: 太郎的血管里流着武士的血。

en: I can't get in touch with Tom.
I can't do it by myself.
This puppet is my only friend.
zh: 这个木偶是我唯一的朋友。

en: Nobody wants to be my friend anymore.
zh: 再也没人想和我做朋友了。

en: Which is more important, me or your job?
zh: 我跟你工作哪个更重要？

en: There is no such a thing as a comprehensive textbook.
zh: 根本就没有那种面面俱到的教科书。

en: I like the gray sweater more than the purple one.
zh: 比起紫色那件，我更喜欢灰色的毛衣。

en: Are you good at speaking Chinese?

zh: 那顶棕色的帽子很旧了。

en: I pawned my guitar in order to pay the rent.
zh: 为了交房租，我把吉他当了。

en: I pawned my guitar so I could pay the rent.
zh: 我把吉他当了，好交房租。

en: The road winded through the fields.
This sentence is in the present tense.
He who does not work, does not have the right to eat.
There's an apostrophe missing. "It's" and "its" are different. -- I know. It was a typing error.
zh: 少了个撇号。“It's”和“its”是不一样的。——我知道，是打错了。

en: The man I met yesterday was Mr. Hill.
zh: 我昨天遇到的那个人是希尔先生。

en: I didn't think you'd get here so soon.
zh: 我没想到你这么快就到了。

en: I didn't expect it to cost so much.
zh: 我没想到要花这么多钱。

en: I didn't think it would take this long.
zh: 我没想到会花这么长时间。

en: I didn't expect that Tom would fall in love with Mary.
zh: 我没想到汤姆会爱上玛丽。

en: The person I met yesterday was Tom.
zh: 我昨天见到的那个人是汤姆。

en: If you get a smartphone, you should download Skype. Telephone bills are such a waste of money.
zh: 如果你买智能手机的话，应该下个Skype。交话费太浪费钱了。

en: My mother doesn't speak much English.

zh: 大家看起来都松了口气。

en: In this room there are over 50 tables.
zh: 这个房间里有50多张桌子。

en: What is your favorite music group?
It's snowing? Oh, that wasn't called for!
Even though what he said was sound, I still wasn't completely convinced.
zh: 虽然他说得很有道理，但我还是没完全被说服。

en: I heard this sentence on the street about an hour ago.
zh: 大约一小时前我在街上听到过这句话。
那句日语听起来很地道。

en: Don't ask me to choose between you and my job.
zh: 别让我从你和我的工作之间做选择。

en: Don't ask me to choose between you and my children.
zh: 别让我从你和我的孩子之间做选择。

en: A child was washed away by the wave!
Please be careful of gales and large waves.
If you want this marriage to work, you need to choose between spending time with me and working all the time.
zh: 如果你想维持这段婚姻，你得在陪我和一直工作之间做个选择。

en: She has the bad habit of always being late.
You shouldn't run around with a toothbrush in your mouth.
zh: 你不该嘴里叼着牙刷跑来跑去。

en: Tom had a cigarette hanging out of his mouth while he vacantly stared up at the sky.
zh: 汤姆嘴里叼着烟，茫然地望着天空。

en: We can't sit there looking wistfully on as this city falls into decay.
zh: 我们不能坐视这座城市日益衰败。

en: I hardly ever walk to work.
zh: 我几乎从不走路去上班。
不幸的是，情况确实如此。
这些衣服是我自己做的。

en: My wife is obsessed with cleanliness.
That child is a bit shy.
There are five apples in the box.
I like Tom best, John second best.
zh: 我最喜欢汤姆，其次是约翰。
汤姆是玛丽的双胞胎哥哥。

en: Is it true that Tom has a twin?
zh: 汤姆真的有个双胞胎兄弟吗？

en: I only know a few words.
In spring, one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn.
The country is in ruins, yet still there are mountains and rivers.
In springtime, the dawn. In summer, the night.
zh: 春天的黎明，夏天的夜晚。

en: Behold! The beauty of the seasons.
Thank you for the Christmas gift.
Summer grasses, all that remain of warriors' dreams.
zh: 夏天的荒草，是战士们留下的梦。
我是通过老李认识他的。

en: A lack of exercise is bad for your health.
We are listening to the radio.
To love oneself is the beginning of a life-long romance.
zh: 爱自己是终生浪漫的开始。

en: No man is rich enough to buy back his own past.
zh: 没有人富有到能买回自己的过去。

en: To become popular, you need to be mediocre.
zh: 想要出名，你就得平庸一点。
我在电视上唱过一次歌。

en: I remember you appeared on television once.
zh: 我记得你上过一次电视。

en: I appeared on television once, but nobody believes me.
zh: 我上过一次电视，但没人信我。

en: Once, I had the chance to appear on television.
zh: 以前我有过一次上电视的机会。

en: I lost my only chance to appear on television.
zh: 我失去了唯一一次上电视的机会。

en: Constantinople fell to the hands of the Ottoman Turks in 1453.
zh: 1453年，君士坦丁堡落入了奥斯曼土耳其人之手。

en: You can eat as much as you want.
There are many more vowels in French than in Japanese.
zh: 法语里的元音比日语里的多得多。

en: I have never seen a rugby match as exciting as yesterday's match.
zh: 我从未看过像昨天那样精彩的橄榄球赛。

en: Depending on how things go, it's possible there'll be a surprise ending.
zh: 看情况吧，可能会有个出人意料的结局。

en: Do you want to ask me any questions?
zh: 你有什么问题想问我吗？

en: I just wanted to give him some advice, but in the end I made him angry.
zh: 我本想给他点建议，结果把他惹火了。

en: Please pay attention to what I'm saying.

zh: 我们听到了教堂的钟声。

en: I had a strict curfew at my house.
Sorry, but I'm a little slow-witted.
Tom's sentences are really hard to translate.
When was the last time you saw that cat?
zh: 你上次见到那只猫是什么时候？

en: The population of this country is gradually diminishing.
zh: 这个国家的人口正在逐渐减少。

en: A month is too little time.
French and Arabic are spoken in this country.
zh: 这个国家说法语和阿拉伯语。

en: How long will you be in Boston?
He lost his only son in an accident.
zh: 他在一次事故中失去了唯一的儿子。
你能给汤姆打个电话吗？

en: Good medicine tastes bitter, good advice is hard to listen to.
I got gastroenteritis the other day, so I went to the hospital.
zh: 我前几天得了肠胃炎，去医院了。

en: Gastroenteritis is often caused by the norovirus.
zh: 肠胃炎通常是由诺如病毒引起的。

en: I can't use my left hand because of the plaster cast.
zh: 我左手打了石膏，没法用。
汤姆和玛丽幸存了下来。
一切看起来都像是谎言。

en: I will always be there for you.
zh: 我会一直陪在你身边的。

en: The Japanese word "mofumofu" is used to describe fluffy and light animals.
zh: 日语里的“mofumofu”是用来形容毛茸茸、软绵绵的小动物的。

en: One can walk to school in ten minutes.
zh: 走路去学校只要十分钟。

en: Also, after it is whipped, a fluffy texture emerges.
zh: 而且打发之后，口感会变得松松软软的。

en: Tom says he's snuggled with his girlfriend, but they haven't yet kissed.
zh: 汤姆说他跟女朋友抱也抱过了，但还没接过吻。
那种事发生在谁身上都有可能。

en: Did you go somewhere this summer?
zh: 你这个暑假去哪儿玩了吗？

en: Tom can't explain the difference between cheap wine and expensive wine.
zh: 汤姆分不出好酒和便宜酒的区别。

en: The well is in the middle of this plaza.
I'll go if the weather's good.
It rarely snows in this area.
He likes animals more than people.
zh: 比起人来，他更喜欢动物。

en: "Freedom, Equality, Brotherhood" is also Haiti's motto.
zh: “自由、平等、博爱”也是海地的座右铭。

en: I think there are a lot of beautiful women in Australia (YMMV).
zh: 我觉得澳大利亚美女挺多的（当然这因人而异）。

en: Does a solution come to mind?
Can you think of a solution?
As a result of new ultra-light materials, our product now only weighs about half as much as before!
zh: 因为采用了新型超轻材料，我们的产品现在只有以前的一半重了！

en: At last, I managed to find him.

zh: 你跟你爸简直一模一样。
这里同性婚姻是合法的。

en: I think you should stop smoking.
I think that you should stop smoking.
Greece was the cradle of western civilization.
zh: 希腊是西方文明的发源地。

en: There are also some children who don't like apples.
zh: 也有一些孩子不喜欢吃苹果。

en: The plane still hasn't taken off.
The woman was sitting between two men.
zh: 那个女人坐在两个男人中间。

en: Under the shadow of the oak tree, Tom and Mary recited haiku to each other all day long.
zh: 在橡树荫下，汤姆和玛丽互相念了一整天的俳句。

en: Tom loved Mary, but she didn't like him at all.
zh: 汤姆爱玛丽，但她一点儿也不喜欢他。

en: We'll arrive in three hours if we drive.
zh: 开车的话，我们三小时就能到。

en: What time did the meeting end?
What time do you have dinner?
Which group is your friend in?
I speak Berber to my teacher.
He speaks Berber to his teachers.
zh: 他跟他的老师们说柏柏尔语。

en: Hi. If I'm not mistaken, you're our new neighbors, aren't you?
zh: 嗨，如果我没弄错，你们就是新搬来的邻居吧？

en: Please take a seat and wait.
One morning, when I woke up, I found that all the bills in my wallet had changed into two-thousand yen bills.
zh: 有天早上我醒来，发现钱包里所有的纸币都变成了两千日元的钞票。

en: I woke up one morning to find that all the bills in my wallet had turned into two-thousand yen bills.
zh: 有一天早上我醒来，发现钱包里所有的钱全变成了两千块面值的日元。

en: It's a lot of trouble to write my name, because it takes 50 strokes to write both my first and last names.
zh: 写我的名字很麻烦，因为姓和名加起来一共有50画。

en: Tom made Mary wash his car.
Tom made Mary wash the car.
"Do you like Tom?" "I like him, but I can't see him as a romantic interest."
zh: “你喜欢汤姆吗？”“我挺喜欢他的，但对他没那种感觉。”

en: This kind of mistake is easy to overlook.
zh: 这种错误很容易被忽略。

en: These kinds of mistakes are easy to overlook.
zh: 这些错误很容易被忽略。

en: The large intestine is about 1.5m long.
The stomach connects to the small intestine.
The small intestine is about seven meters long.
The small intestine consists of three parts.
I don't want you to wake him up.

zh: 我其实也不太清楚为什么。
我不觉得这有什么奇怪的。
我们收到了一些新消息。

en: I want to become an astronaut.

zh: 东京是个开销很大的城市。

en: That's enough! Open your eyes and wake up now!
The worth of a thing is best known by the want of it.
zh: 只有在需要的时候，才知道东西的珍贵。

en: This sweater is comfortable to take off and put on.
zh: 这件毛衣穿脱都很舒服。

en: When did Tom start working here?
zh: 汤姆是什么时候开始在这里工作的？

en: How many years did Tom work here?
zh: 汤姆在这里工作了多少年？

en: I've got something I want to show you.
There's something I want you to see.

zh: 汤姆，这事儿跟你没关系。

en: I shouldn't have gone home late at night by myself.
zh: 我真不该大半夜一个人回家。

en: Tom and I went to the same high school.
Tom and I went to the same high school. He was a year behind me.
zh: 我和汤姆读的是同一所高中，他比我低一届。

en: Tom and I went to the same high school. He was two years below me.
zh: 我和汤姆读的是同一所高中，他比我低两届。

en: Tom and I go to the same high school.
zh: 我和汤姆在同一所高中。

en: Tom and I went to the same high school. He was a year ahead of me.
zh: 我和汤姆读的是同一所高中，他比我高一届。

en: Tom and I went to the same high school. He was two years above me.
zh: 我和汤姆读的是同一所高中，他比我高两届。

en: I have arrived at the train station.
I'm asking you, so please stop.
zh: 我是在求你，所以请停下来。

en: I want you to love me for who I am.
zh: 我希望你爱的是我这个人。

en: He must be a quack doctor.
Honestly, I don't think you have what it takes to become a teacher.
zh: 老实说，我觉得你不是当老师的那块料。

en: She figured as a gray eminence.
I can't read cursive, so could you write in block letters, please?
zh: 我看不懂草写，能请你用正楷写吗？

en: Could someone make an example sentence using the German word "Beispiel"?
zh: 有人能用德语单词“Beispiel”造个句吗？

en: Could someone make an example sentence in German using the word "Beispiel?"
zh: 有人能用“Beispiel”造个德语句子吗？

en: This cheese is made from goat's milk.
zh: 这种奶酪是用山羊奶做的。

en: I wish I could have spoken more English.
zh: 我希望我当时能多说点英语。

en: I wish there were less homework.
zh: 要是作业能少点就好了。

en: I can't read handwritten script, so could you please write it in printed script?
zh: 我看不懂手写体，能请你用印刷体写吗？

en: Frankly speaking, I don't think you have what it takes to become a teacher.
zh: 坦白说，我觉得你不是当老师的那块料。

en: You have something in your pockets, don't you?
zh: 你口袋里装了东西，对吧？

en: Don't make me go back there.
What do you really think about Tom?
zh: 你到底觉得汤姆怎么样？

en: What do you really think of Tom?
I never want to see that guy again.
zh: 我再也不想见到那家伙了。

en: I didn't know Tom spoke French.
zh: 我以前不知道汤姆会说法语。

en: Checks should be made payable to the ABC Company.
I didn't know that you could drive.

zh: 我已经跟我爸妈说过了。

en: She likes to talk about herself.
I'm not going to school today.
I assume it was Tom's idea.
I assume you are talking about Tom.
I assume you're talking about Tom.
They were in that room with me all night.
zh: 他们整晚都跟我待在那个房间里。

en: It's not legal for people under 20 to drink in Canada.
zh: 在加拿大，不满20岁喝酒是违法的。

en: The longsword was sheathed in an intricately engraved scabbard.
zh: 那把长剑插在一个雕刻精美的剑鞘里。

en: I believe his name is Tom.
I bet Tom would be a good teacher.
zh: 我打赌汤姆会是个好老师。

en: It's a little expensive for lunch, but the taste matches the price.
zh: 这顿午饭有点贵，但味道对得起这个价格。

en: She was abducted by aliens from the planet Tatoeba.
zh: 她被来自Tatoeba星球的外星人绑架了。

en: She sells seashells by the seashore.
I don't think that many people can say they're satisfied with their salary.
zh: 我觉得没多少人敢说对自己的工资很满意。

en: I don't think that many people can say they are satisfied with their salary.
zh: 我觉得没多少人敢说对自己的工资很满意。

en: I don't think many people can say they're satisfied with their salary.
zh: 我觉得没多少人敢说对自己的工资很满意。

en: I don't know what you're talking about!
Tom hasn't had anything but water since last night.
zh: 汤姆从昨晚起就只喝了点水。

en: Rice does not like moisture. Be sure to store it well.
I called you here to help me.
zh: 我叫你来是想让你帮帮我。

en: I wrote my teacher a love letter and he read it in front of the whole class.
zh: 我给老师写了封情书，结果他在全班面前读了出来。

en: I came here to see Tom.
I came to see the show.
I read The Great Gatsby when I was in high school.
zh: 我上高中的时候读过《了不起的盖茨比》。

en: There's a sauna and a pool.
zh: 那儿有桑拿房和游泳池。

en: I can no longer fulfill my obligations.
zh: 我没法再履行我的义务了。

en: I can see why you don't like Tom.
zh: 我明白你为什么不喜欢汤姆。

en: The bride was wearing a white wedding dress.
zh: 新娘穿着一件白色的婚纱。

en: I can't believe it's raining again.
zh: 真不敢相信居然又下雨了。

en: Don’t bother explaining. Because I’m not interested.

zh: 我讨厌像他那样的警察。

en: I find the sound of the rain relaxing.
zh: 我觉得雨声听着很解压。

en: She dreamed of becoming a ballerina.
zh: 她梦想成为一名芭蕾舞演员。

en: Is it a compliment or an insult?
zh: 这是在夸我还是在损我？

en: My teacher told me that I should've spent more time preparing my speech.
zh: 老师说我的演讲应该再多花点时间准备的。

en: Do you spend more time with your friends or your family?
zh: 你跟朋友在一起的时间多，还是跟家人在一起的时间多？
虽然挺让人难过的，但这是事实。

en: My teacher told me that I should have spent more time preparing my presentation.
zh: 老师说我的报告应该多花点时间准备。

en: My teacher told me that I should've spent more time preparing my presentation.
zh: 老师说我那个报告应该多花点时间准备的。

en: The shop is open all day.
I came to apologize for what happened yesterday.
zh: 我是为昨天的事来跟你道歉的。

en: I consider Tom to be a friend.
I couldn't understand why Tom wanted to quit school.
zh: 我不明白Tom为什么要退学。

en: I like to learn old languages.
I wanted to know what happened.
zh: 我想知道发生了什么事。

en: Tom told me Mary was good at playing the piano, but I didn't really believe him until I heard her play.
zh: Tom跟我说Mary钢琴弹得很好，但我直到亲耳听到才相信。

en: Tom is reading a short story.
Tom is only interested in good-looking girls.
zh: Tom只对漂亮的女孩感兴趣。

en: What did you mean in that email you just sent?
zh: 你刚发的那封邮件是什么意思？

en: I definitely wouldn't go there by myself.
zh: 我肯定不会一个人去那儿。

en: I did exactly what you told me to do.
zh: 我完全是按你说的做的。

en: I didn't have time to think about it.
I didn't leave the door open.
Demo's progression was being reported by the participants through SNS.
zh: 参与者们通过社交网络报告了演示的进展。

en: Tom took a shower before breakfast.
I don't care how you do it. Just do it.
zh: 我不管你怎么做，去做就是了。

en: I don't disagree with your decision.
I don't even know where to start.
zh: 我都不知道该从哪儿开始。

en: I don't know where Tom is.
Life would be terribly monotonous and deadly boring if everyone felt, thought and spoke the same.
zh: 如果每个人的感受、想法和说话方式都一样，那生活该多单调、多无聊啊。

en: Since meeting for the first time, I've been thinking about how she's such a lovely-voiced person.
zh: 自从第一次见面，我就一直在想，她的声音可真好听。

en: I'm sorry, I didn't catch your name.
zh: 对不起，我没听清你叫什么名字。

en: I don't intend to leave it to chance.
She suffered from anorexia as a teenager.
zh: 她十几岁的时候得过厌食症。

en: I don't know if I've ever told you, but you have beautiful eyes.
zh: 我不知道有没有跟你说过，你的眼睛真漂亮。

en: I don't know if that's a good idea.
zh: 我不知道那是不是个好主意。

en: I don't know if this will be enough.
I don't know if Tom is dead or alive.
zh: 我不知道汤姆是生是死。

en: I don't know if Tom still lives in Boston.
zh: 我不知道汤姆是不是还住在波士顿。

en: I don't know if we can do that without Tom's permission.
zh: 我不知道如果没有汤姆的允许，我们能不能那样做。

en: I don't know if you remember me, but we met a couple of years ago in Boston.
zh: 不知道你还记不记得我，我们几年前在波士顿见过。

en: I don't know if you've noticed, but Tom seems to have fallen in love with your daughter.
zh: 不知道你有没有注意到，汤姆好像爱上你女儿了。

en: I don't know what I was thinking.
zh: 我不知道我当时在想什么。

en: I don't know what to believe anymore.
zh: 我不知道该相信什么了。

en: I don't know what to say to Tom.
zh: 我不知道该对汤姆说什么。

en: I don't know what Tom is planning to do.
zh: 我不知道汤姆打算做什么。

en: What faculty were they in again?
I want to eat Japanese sweets.
I always have room for dessert.
Japanese sweets are lower in calories than Western sweets.
zh: 和果子的热量比西式甜点低。

en: Indeed, Japanese sweets go well with Japanese tea.
zh: 确实，和果子跟日本茶很搭。

en: Traditional Japanese sweets really do go well with Japanese tea.
zh: 传统的和果子跟日本茶真的很配。

en: I don't know what to tell Tom.
zh: 我不知道该跟汤姆说什么。

en: I don't know what I'm going to tell Tom.
zh: 我不知道该怎么跟汤姆交代。

en: Tom promised he'd never be late again.
zh: 汤姆保证过再也不会迟到了。

en: I don't know. Why don't you ask Tom?
zh: 我不知道。你干嘛不问问汤姆？

en: I don't speak French, but I can understand it a bit.
zh: 我不会说法语，但能听懂一点。

en: I don't think Tom will like this place.
zh: 我觉得汤姆不会喜欢这个地方。

en: I don't want to go to the hospital.
I forgot to ask your name.
zh: 我忘了问你叫什么名字了。

en: I forgot what I was going to say.
I found a place to live.
Their habitat is threatened by deforestation.
zh: 森林砍伐威胁到了它们的栖息地。

en: Girls begin puberty around the ages of ten to eleven, and boys around the ages of eleven to twelve.
zh: 女孩子在十到十一岁左右开始进入青春期，男孩子在十一到十二岁左右。

en: I give you plenty of money each month.
zh: 我每个月都给你不少钱。

en: I got something in my eye.
I had a run of bad luck.
I had to go home and change clothes.
I had to go home and change.
He is a brewer of beer by trade.
There is a communal kitchen in the dormitory.
The sisters played a duet on the violin and piano.
zh: 姐妹俩合奏了一段小提琴和钢琴。

en: Some people listen to music when writing, but others say it hampers their productivity.
zh: 有人写东西时喜欢听音乐，但也有人说这会影响效率。

en: There is a large pile of rubble where the school building used to be.
zh: 学校大楼原址现在是一大堆瓦砾。

en: I felt a small tremor, but rather than an earthquake, it was just a truck driving by.
zh: 我感觉震了一下，但不是地震，只是卡车开过去了。

en: Certain artificial sweeteners are known to be carcinogens.
zh: 某些人造甜味剂是公认的致癌物。

en: She plans to marry a rich man.
Atoms are composed of protons, neutrons, and electrons.
zh: 原子是由质子、中子和电子组成的。

en: Tom prefers to take a shower in the morning while Mary prefers to take a bath just before going to bed.
zh: 汤姆喜欢早上洗澡，而玛丽喜欢睡前泡澡。

en: Tom was twelve when the Berlin Wall fell.
zh: 柏林墙倒塌时汤姆十二岁。
我要把你眼珠子抠出来！
我收到一封奇怪的邮件。

en: You can cry now. It's okay.
It's necessary that we all work together to complete this assignment.
zh: 咱们得通力合作才能完成这项任务。

en: This is a really beautiful city!
These flowers have a really nice fragrance.
This fresh raw fish is delicious.
zh: 这新鲜的生鱼片真好吃。

en: I think it's highly unlikely that Tom would be interested in buying your old MP3 player.
zh: 我觉得汤姆不太可能会想买你那台旧MP3。

en: I'd like to borrow about three hundred dollars.
If the trees on that hill are cut down, you'll see erosion pretty quickly.
zh: 如果那座山上的树被砍光了，很快就会出现水土流失。

en: Tom told me I had done pretty good.
zh: 汤姆说我做得挺不错的。

en: I really love her older sister a lot.
I have two friends who live in Germany.
zh: 我有两个朋友住在德国。

en: He paid with a credit card.
What kind of game do you think this is?
zh: 你觉得这是个什么样的游戏？
